subject_content_text: Sir, please press this to PCPO EASTERN RAILWAY office. Respected Sir Chairman Railway Board, New Delhi, Sir, as per the rules of Indian Railways, along with open recruitment to fill the vacant posts in Railways, there is also a provision for recruitment of GDCE in Railways, for which 25 percent quota has been fixed by Railways. Sir, it is very sad that these rules are not being followed in EASTERN RAILWAY and no recruitment is being done by EASTERN RAILWAY for the posts of Asst Loco Pilot, Technician, Station Master Etc for GDCE GENERAL COMPETITIVE EXAMINATION. Is. Sir, there is no information about when was the last time the recruitment of Asst Loco Pilot from GDCE quota came in EASTERN RAILWAY. Sir, I humbly request you to take my complaint seriously and look into the reasons for not getting recruitment under GDCE in EASTERN RAILWAY and take immediate action.

Respected sir Date of Journey 10.jan2022 I,Tousif Alam a resident of India,Kolkata is right now travelling in Vande Bharat with my family member ticket attached on the mail, neither i am someone to review the service on the internet by making vlog videos neither i am some one who will give bites to media stating the service of vande Bharatwhich has recently started in west bengal. I am a proud citizen and i am proud that my state has been given a state of art train plying from njp to hwh as vice-versa I am sitting on my particular seat Asile 2 in E1 COACH the coach is adacent to the door which was to be automatic . It should automatically close and open complying with the sensor. Point to be noted. If by any chance it is open strong wind gusts inside the compartment and you can understand a train which is gusting at around 108 to 109 km per hour gives a strong wind and specially the front row is badly effected but problem happens understanding the excitement that is running through everyone for the new train. I have ethicaly complied with the unethical problem for more that 5 times today the door was open and staffs were going through and fro. I have myself stood up and closed the door of the compartment by pulling the handle . The first 4 times i have complied with the staffs as they were the only one who are going through and fro not the people who are serving ,but the people who call them as managers and top boss of the in house service of vande bharat Like they are 2 to 4 people highly dressed in IRCTC Uniform white shirt blank pant and suit with their id covered

Kindly refer to the grievance XPX/X/X0X3X8X1X6 dated 07/04/2013 closed/rejected on 18/06/2014 by an unknown official of the Railway Board. The matter is being pursued from the Year 1999 onwards. I worked in Power Grid Corporation of in India Ltd. (POWERGRID), in New Delhi from 1-8-1994 to 24-12-99 prior to joining Railways on 27-12-1999. POWERGRID is a Schedule A Public Sector Undertaking under the Ministry of Power. The post held was Engineer which is equivalent to a Junior Scale in the Government of India. POWERGRID is having IDA pattern of PayScale. Despite the persistent request, Railways have not accorded Pay Protection for services rendered in POWERGRID. Kindly advise Railways to arrange for pay protection.

To, shree Prime Minister, Railway Minister, DRM Shri, Western Railway, Bhavnagar. Subject :-conversion of meter gauge railway line connecting Junagadh-Amreli-Gir Somnath three districts to broad gauge. I, have received representations from the people that, about four years ago, the Government of India and the Railways, Khijadiya-Amreli, Amreli-Visavadar,The Visavadar-Junagadh and Visavadar-Veraval trains run on meter gauge and have been replaced by broad gauge approved by the present government and the railways for the last four years but no action has been taken till date. If broad gauge is used instead of meter gauge, it will be very useful for the people of three to four districts. Apart from this, Junagadh is also known as the land of Dutt and Datar. Twice in year, people come from all over the country to perform Shivratri and Liliparikrama. Apart from Narsinh Mehta's Karmabhoomi,Bhavnath, the largest ropeway, there are many places to visit.Tourists who come here also prefer to travel in trains passing through Gir forest for their recreation when there are places of interest. The broad gauge is likely to be a blessing to the people of the three districts,but unfortunately,despite the long delay in the announcement,the work has not been carried out till date.i am request immediately resume the work of this broad gauge which has been approved.We request you to send a reply to the action taken by the applicable department to my address in accordance with the civil rights letter.

Prati Shri, Chief Minister Shri, Gujarat State, Prati Shri, Harshbhai Sanghvi, Cave Minister Shri, Gujarat State, Prathi Shri DGP Shri, Gujarat State, *Subject:- Matter of construction of traffic police station in Surat city like other cities.* Regards sir To inform that we have complained on PMO portal several times in the past about the traffic problem of Varachha area in the city, but no concrete action has been taken on the complaint till date. Because of this, the traffic problem in the Varachha area of ​​the city has taken a severe form, which will further increase the number of people in the future. We expect you to get traffic police stations in Surat city like other cities. Currently, according to the information received in an RTI, we found that there is no traffic police station in Surat city, despite the population of approximately 70 lakh people in Surat city, there is no traffic police station, after which we have submitted this application to you. The Home Minister of Gujarat State and the MLA of Surat City have one expectation of the citizens of Surat City. The traffic department of Surat city should get its own police station to make the work of the traffic department easier and better, so that the traffic staff can do their work better. As a result, the traffic problem of the city can be solved to a large extent now and in the future. It is expected that a suitable decision will be taken by you regarding this request and the citizens of Surat and the traffic department will get a traffic police station during your tenure. In this regard, it is submitted that we will inform the applicant by letter of any decision taken at your level ✍️ Lee. Kuldeep K Gohel, 307, Dream Land, Sarthana Jakatnaka, Surat. Copy of dispatch:- 1)Chief Secretary Shri, Gujarat. 2) Commissioner Shri Surat Police,

तालुका कृषी कार्यालयात अधिकारी भेटत नसल्याने शेतकऱ्यांची गैरसोय

तुमसर (११ जानेवारी, भंडारा) : येथील तालुका कृषी अधिकारी यांच्या ढिसाळ कारभारामुळे हजारो शेतकऱ्यांना रोज तालुक्यातील कृषि कर्मचारी शोधत फिरण्याची वेळ आली आहे. त्यामुळे कृषी विभागाकडून राबवण्यिात येत असलेल्या विविध योजना माहितच होत नसल्याने शेतकऱ्यांचा खोळंबा होत आहे. तालुक्यात राज्य शासनाच्या कृषी विभागाकडून शेतकऱ्यांना खते, बियाणे, कृषी अवजारे आदी कृषी पुरक साधने उपलब्ध होत असतात. तसेच शेतकऱ्यांना वेळोवेळी कृषी विषयक मार्गदर्शन देण्याची व्यवस्था असते. शेतीची उत्पादकता वाढविण्याच्या उद्देशाने शासनाकडून अनेक योजना राबविल्या जातात. मात्र तालुका कृषि कार्यालया अंतर्गत येणाऱ्या ९७ गावातील शेतकरी या योजनापासून वंचित राहत आहेत.
तुमसर येथे तालुका कृषी कार्यालय हे भाड्याच्या इमारतीत सुरू आहे. तालुक्यातील शेतकऱ्यांना शेतातील कामे सोडून कृषी विषयक मार्गदर्शन तसेच शासकीय योजनांची माहिती घेण्यासाठी कृषी कार्यालयात जावे लागते़ तिथे गेल्यानंतर अधिकारी, क्षेत्र भेटीवर गेल्याचे कारण सांगितले जाते़ त्यामुळे शेतकऱ्यांना शेकडो रुपयांचा भुर्दंड सहन करुन मनस्तापाशिवाय हाती काहीच लागत नाही.
तालुका कृषि कार्यालयातील अधिकाऱ्यांना कार्यक्षेत्रात राहणे बंधनकारक असतानाही अधिकारी मात्र इतरत्र सोयीनुसार राहत असून कृषी विभागाने शेतकऱ्यांची चेष्टा चालविल्याच्या संतप्त प्रतिक्रिया शेतकऱ्यांमधून उमटत आहेत. तालुका कृषि कार्यालयाच्या ढिसाळ कारभारामुळे शेतकऱ्यांची मोठी गैरसोय होत आहे. तालुका कृषि कार्यालयाच्या सर्व कारभार रामभरोसे असून विविध कामासाठी नेहमीच तालुक्याच्या ठिकाणी जाणारे मोजकेच लोक अधिकाऱ्यांना हाताशी धरून वारंवार योजनांचा लाभ घेतात. मात्र सामान्य शेतकरी कृषी विभागाच्या योजनांपासून वंचितच आहे. शेतकऱ्यांना तालुका कृषि कार्यालयाकडून काहीच फायदा होत नसल्याने अधिकारी कर्मचारी करतात तरी काय, असा प्रश्न उपस्थित केला जात आहे. 
यासंदर्भात शिवसेनेने जिल्हा कृषी अधिक्षक डॉ. अर्चना प्रकाश कडू यांना भंडारा जिल्हा कृषी अधिकारी कार्यालयात भेटून निवेदन सादर केला तसेच वरिष्ठ अधिकाऱ्यांनी याप्रकरणी लक्ष घालून कारवाई करण्याची मागणी केली. जर तालुका कृषि कार्यालयाने कामकाजात सुधारणा नाही केल्यास संबंधित तालुका कृषि कार्यालया विरुद्ध आंदोलन छेडले जाईल अशा इशारा शिवसेनेकडून निवेदन देतेवेळी देण्यात आला. यावेळी शिवसेनेचे विभाग प्रमुख अमित एच. मेश्राम, शाखा प्रमुख पुष्पक त्रिभुवनकर, निखील कटारे, अमोल बावणे, घनश्याम पोटभरे, महेंद्रसिंग रावते, राजू ठाकूर, स्वप्निल बडवाईक, आदित्य गभने, दीपक मलेवार, रितेश शेंडे, योगेश चिंधालोरे, सतीश वाकरकर उपस्थित होते.

A tap was given which got damaged about 4 years ago and an application was given for getting the tap rebared, in which the taps were included in the action plan by Secretary Saurabh about 2 years ago. It was reported that the work should be completed on priority basis. Will be given but unfortunately this work has not been completed and the tap approved in the name of Munni Devi has been installed at some other place with the connivance of the present head and secretary and due to which the common people are facing the problem of drinking water supply. Due to lack of water, people are falling ill because they have to drink water that has been kept for a month in which germs grow and they have to drink the water that is full of germs, due to which people are suffering from various types of diseases. It is important that there is no risk of loss of life. Keeping this in mind, it is very important to get the tap rebored, hence Mr. District Magistrate is requested to kindly get the tap rebored as soon as possible. It will be your great kindness. Applicant, Munni Devi, wife, Shri Radhe Lal, resident of Rajpur Kotla development block, Narkhi district, Firozabad, Uttar Pradeshjbb682780.

aa:
ABOUT CPGRAMS

Centralised Public Grievance Redress and Monitoring System (CPGRAMS) is an online platform available to the citizens 24x7 to lodge their grievances to the public authorities on any subject related to service delivery. It is a single portal connected to all the Ministries/Departments of Government of India and States. Every Ministry and States have role-based access to this system. CPGRAMS is also accessible to the citizens through standalone mobile application downloadable through Google Play store and mobile application integrated with UMANG.

The status of the grievance filed in CPGRAMS can be tracked with the unique registration ID provided at the time of registration of the complainant. CPGRAMS also provides appeal facility to the citizens if they are not satisfied with the resolution by the Grievance Officer. After closure of grievance if the complainant is not satisfied with the resolution, he/she can provide feedback. If the rating is ‘Poor’ the option to file an appeal is enabled. The status of the Appeal can also be tracked by the petitioner with the grievance registration number.

 Issues which are not taken up for redress :
  RTI Matters
  Court related / Subjudice matters
  Religious matters
  Suggestions
  Grievances of Government employees concerning their service matters including disciplinary proceedings etc. unless the aggrieved employee has already exhausted the prescribed channels keeping in view the DoPT OM No. 11013/08/2013-Estt.(A-III) dated 31.08.2015
Note :

If you have not got a satifactory redress of your grievance within a reasonable period of time,relating to Ministries/Departments and Organisations under the purview of Directorate of Public Grievances(DPG), Cabinet Secretariat, GOI, you may seek help of DPG in resolution. Please click here for details.
Government is not charging fee from the public for filing grievances. All money being paid by the public for filing grievance is going only to M/s CSC only
